# User defined functions

```{r}
# Helper function (put this at the top of your script)
save_if <- function(plot_object, filename, width, height, ...) {
  if (save_plots) {
    ggsave(plot = plot_object,
           filename = filename,
           width = width,
           height = height,
           dpi = 300)
  }
}
# change to TRUE to save plots
save_plots <- TRUE
```

# Load required Seurat object

```{r}
e12_control <- readRDS(file.path(out_dir, "e12_control.rds"))

stopifnot(inherits(e12_control, "Seurat"))

Idents(e12_control) <- "seurat_clusters"
Idents(e12_control) <- factor(Idents(e12_control))
DefaultAssay(e12_control) <- "RNA"

# Save the existing Seurat clusters
e12_control$full_dataset_clusters <- e12_control$seurat_clusters

```

## Set up the cell-type colours

```{r}
celltype_cols <- c("Myocardium" = "#E41A1C",
                   "VSMC" = "#377EB8", 
                   "Epicardium" = "#4DAF4A",
                   "Mesenchyme" = "#984EA3", 
                   "Endocardium" = "#FF7F00",
                   "Other/Unknown" = "grey70")

epicardial_genes <- c("Wt1", "Upk3b", "Apela", "Upk1b", "Aldh1a2")

endocardial_genes <- c("Ecscr", "Cdh5", "Tie1", "Rasip1", "Plxnd1")
```


# Re-embed Normalise, find variable features, scale, PCA, UMAP, cluster and visualise
## e12_control

```{r}
# quick dimplot using the existing clusters
DimPlot(e12_control,
        group.by = "seurat_clusters")

n_dims = 30
# Re-computation of graph-based clustering and UMAP on the cleaned dataset
re_embed_e12_control <- FindVariableFeatures(e12_control,
                                        selection.method = "vst", 
                                        nfeatures = 3000,
                                        verbose = FALSE) %>%
  ScaleData(features = rownames(e12_control),
            verbose = FALSE) %>%
  RunPCA(verbose = FALSE) %>%
  FindNeighbors(dims = 1:n_dims,
                verbose = FALSE) %>%
  RunUMAP(dims = 1:n_dims,
          verbose = FALSE)

# plot the umap with old cluster numbers and colours
umap_oldCluster <- DimPlot(re_embed_e12_control,
        reduction = "umap",
        group.by = "full_dataset_clusters",
        label = TRUE,
        label.size = 6
        ) +
  labs(
    title = "e12_control - new embedding (old clusters)",
    caption = "e12_control"
  ) +
  NoLegend()
save_if(umap_oldCluster,
        filename = file.path(out_dir, "09-umap.re_embed_e12_control.old_clusters.png"),
        width = 8,
        height = 8)

# plot the umap with new celltypes
umap_newCelltype <- DimPlot(re_embed_e12_control,
        reduction = "umap",
        group.by = "new_celltypes",
        label = TRUE,
        label.size = 6
        ) +
  labs(
    title = "e12_control - new embedding (new celltypes)",
    caption = "e12_control"
  ) +
    scale_color_manual(values = celltype_cols) +
  NoLegend()
umap_newCelltype
save_if(umap_newCelltype,
           filename = file.path(out_dir, "09-umap.re_embed_e12_control.new_celltypes.png"),
           width = 8,
           height = 8)

endocardial_markers <- FeaturePlot(
  object = re_embed_e12_control,
  features = c("Ecscr", "Cdh5"),
  ncol = 1,                      # side-by-side panels
  order = TRUE                   # high-expression cells on top
  ) &
  scale_colour_gradientn(
    colours = rev(RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(11, "Spectral")),
    name = "Expression"
  ) &
  plot_annotation(
    title = "e12_control Endocardial lineage markers",
    caption = "e12_control"
  ) &
  theme_bw(base_size = 14) &
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(hjust = 0.5)
  )
endocardial_markers
save_if(endocardial_markers, 
       filename = file.path(out_dir, "09-umap.re_embed_e12_control.endocardial_genes.png"),
       width = 16,
       height = 8)

epicardial_markers <- FeaturePlot(
```
